rawContent:
# Input Component

[component]
id = "input"
name = "Input"
description = "Text input field with validation"
category = "ui"

[[props]]
name = "type"
type = "enum"
values = ["text", "email", "password", "number", "tel", "url"]
default = "text"
description = "Input type"

[[props]]
name = "placeholder"
type = "string"
required = false
description = "Placeholder text"

[[props]]
name = "label"
type = "string"
required = false
description = "Field label"

[[props]]
name = "error"
type = "string"
required = false
description = "Error message"

[[props]]
name = "disabled"
type = "boolean"
default = false
description = "Disabled state"

[[props]]
name = "required"
type = "boolean"
default = false
description = "Required field"

[[variants]]
name = "Default"
props = { placeholder = "Enter text..." }

[[variants]]
name = "With Label"
props = { label = "Email", type = "email", placeholder = "you@example.com" }

[[variants]]
name = "With Error"
props = { label = "Email", value = "invalid", error = "Please enter a valid email" }

[[variants]]
name = "Password"
props = { label = "Password", type = "password", placeholder = "••••••••" }

[[variants]]
name = "Disabled"
props = { label = "Disabled", placeholder = "Cannot edit", disabled = true }

[[variants]]
name = "Required"
props = { label = "Required Field", placeholder = "This is required", required = true }

[usage]
code = """
import { Input } from '@prototype/components/ui/Input'

<Input
  label="Email"
  type="email"
  placeholder="you@example.com"
  error={errors.email?.message}
/>
"""
